column4: I got a Problem, if i want to ./configure atk-1.0.3 there comes this error:
*** GLIB 2.0.0 or better is required. The latest version of
*** GLIB is always available from ftp://ftp.gtk.org/.
but Synapse tell me that its installed
but there is an glib1.2 package
should i maybe remove it ? oO
hmm okay ... what should i do ? :| its very important to get it workin
